snippet: HC Davos took to the ice Tuesday without the Rangers' Rick Nash, who sustained what was described as a non-serious shoulder injury in a Swiss National League A game last Friday.
abstract: HC Davos took to the ice Tuesday without the Rangers' Rick Nash, who sustained what was described as a non-serious shoulder injury in a Swiss National League A game last Friday.

headline.main: Nursing Shoulder Injury, Nash Sits Out Game in Switzerland
